Site_description: Pelagic upstream site in Beaverdam Reservoir at the location of the upstream pipe outflow leading to Falling Creek Reservoir
Pelagic deep hole site nearest to dam; at BVR platform closest to dam

Inflow stream site to Carvins Cove Reservoir at Carvins Creek Stream accessed via fire road near red barns

Inflow tunnel site to Carvins Cove Reservoir at emergence of Catawaba Creek Tunnel
Outflow stream site at Falling Creek Reservoir spillway
Pelagic deep hole site nearest to Falling Creek Reservoir dam; at end of FCR catwalk

Inflow stream site on Falling Creek secondary inflow to Falling Creek Reservoir; also referred to as the wetland stream
